name: Skeleton Technologies OÜ
membership: EIT InnoEnergy, Estonian Defence Industry Association
goal:
Skeleton Technologies is active in Research and Development activities related to materials, production technologies and systems design research in ultracapacitor based energy storage systems.

Skeleton has been asked and is willing to provide input for the appraisal, strategic positioning and financing of EU and national RTD activities.
interests: Business and Industry, Energy, Environment, Foreign affairs and security policy, Research and innovation, Transport
euInitiatives: Skeleton has been engaged in such activities by participating at workshops organized by EIT, industry associations (e.g. The Defence Industry Association), feedback sessions with implementing Agencies (ETAG in Estonia) and private consultancies engaged in programme evaluation. Skeleton Technologies GmbH is participating in the EU Battery Alliance
